snippet: The new iPad has a high-definition screen, faster wireless connection and several other refinements for the same price as the old one, $499.
abstract: Apple updates its iPad with a high-definition screen, faster wireless connection and several other refinements for the same price as the old one, $499; device has no major design changes; in a sign that Apple intends to more seriously protect its share of the tablet market, the company will continue to sell its second-generation iPad, dropping the price to $399 from $499.
lead_paragraph: The new iPad has a high-definition screen, faster wireless connection and several other refinements for the same price as the old one, $499.

headline.seo: Apple Updates iPad With Some Refinements
headline.main: Apple Adds Sharper Screen and Speed to New iPad
